item.description:
hi everyone,

let's meetup this friday night as the chicken slacks return to johnny d's in somerville's davis square.

the last time we saw the chicken slacks, on 2 july at the cantab, we had a huge turnout ... in a tiny venue. while everyone had a great time, a little more elbow room would have been nice.

johnny d's has much more room, including a much bigger dance floor. so come on out on friday night and shake it with the slackies.


Important Notes
---------------------

dinner:

as of 2:30 pm, friday, 21 august we have 12 diners and that's our limit for tonight. thanks everyone for the great response!

the band:

check out the chicken slacks on the band website or on myspace. you can also read this Weekly Dig article.

johnny d's:

johnny d's has a cover charge; usually $10. note that this cover charge is not waived if you are having dinner at johnny d's.

parking can be tight in davis square, so if you're driving allow extra time to find parking. see this parking map to get an idea of the local parking options.

for T riders: the davis square red line T stop is directly across the street from johnny d's.
item.how_to_find_us: i'll email a cell # to everyone who RSVPs 'Yes' or 'Maybe' by 21 august, 3 p.m.
item.name: Chicken Slacks @ Johnny D's
